body_html:
I have the same problem as this. I have a small graph of 30MB (7.5MB after quantization). On 1080Ti quantization increases inference time from 8ms to 5s. And on DrivePX2 embedded device it increases from 100ms -> 800ms.

I observe that on both devices, after quantization the graph is processed on the CPU. By inspecting nvidia-smi I can see that the GPU memory is allocated but no processing occurs on it.

I observe that on both devices, after quantization the graph is processed on the CPU. By inspecting nvidia-smi I can see that the GPU memory is allocated but no processing occurs on it.
body:
I have the same problem as this. I have a small graph of 30MB (7.5MB after quantization). On 1080Ti quantization increases inference time from 8ms to 5s. And on DrivePX2 embedded device it increases from 100ms -> 800ms.

I observe that on both devices, after quantization the graph is processed on the CPU. By inspecting nvidia-smi I can see that the GPU memory is allocated but no processing occurs on it.
